explanation: [0-0] A young woman with brown hair, wearing an orange sweatshirt and a white baseball cap, stands in front of a green background wall. She holds a white radish up to her mouth with both hands, her eyes closed and her brows slightly furrowed. Above her, from left to right, are pictures of several food items: white radish, celery, red grapefruit, chocolate ice cream, chocolate sauce, and Sprite.

[0-6] The woman then takes a big bite of the white radish, her metal braces visible. She then tilts her head back, holding the top of the radish in her right hand and the bottom in her left, breaking it in two. She continues to eat the piece in her right hand. Soon, only a small piece of the top remains. The woman chews with a dissatisfied expression and then throws the remaining radish away.

[6-15] The scene then switches to the woman picking up a plastic bag of celery. She tears the bag open with both hands, picks up the whole celery stalk with her left hand, breaks off a piece with her right hand, and puts it in her mouth. She eats the celery in large bites, then picks up the whole stalk and continues eating with an impatient expression. She then bites into the celery stalk and pulls hard, tearing it apart. She chews the celery in her mouth, throws away the rest, shakes her head, and looks ahead.

[33-38] The scene changes again, and the woman is holding a jar of chocolate sauce with the lid open. Then the scene switches to the woman holding the chocolate sauce in her left hand and scooping it into the jar with a spoon in her right hand. [38-43] The scene then switches to the woman picking up a can of Sprite. Then she holds the can in her left hand and pulls open the tab on top with her right hand.
